name: Small Worlds (Random Precision Software)
description:
Bored in lockdown? then play this!

3D spot the difference you can rotate and zoom into miniature worlds!

24 miniature worlds

can you spot the 5 changes in the scenes?

including 4 tracks of relaxing music.

Keys: left and right arrow keys to rotate and up & down for zoom

Mouse: click left button while dragging left and right (of bottom of screen) to rotate

and scroll wheel for zoom
